snippet.title: Spyragon Classic - Levels 1-3 Full Gameplay
snippet.description:
Spyragon is available to play on the iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/spyragon/id1584715775

Spyragon is a casual puzzle game that goes beyond the traditional match-3 grid format. It's also about strategically positioning and combining matches around the hexagonal board. The game may seem simple, but mastering it is anything but.  This video displays full gameplay of Levels 1-3, and shows examples of Stars, Combos, Full Hexagons, and uses of the Builder tool.  

00:00 - Level 1
01:20 - Level 2
02:40 - Level 3

Directions: https://spyraverse.com/spyragon/?mode=classic

Also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @spyraverse

#Spyragon #Spyraverse #gaming #mobilegames #mobilegaming #iosgames #ios #hypercasual #newgames
